alert.note: Alert for Bolivar Peninsula; Chambers; Coastal Galveston; Coastal Harris; Galveston Island; Southern Liberty (Texas) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued September 08 at 4:02PM CDT by NWS Houston - Galveston
info.description: ...Strong thunderstorms will impact portions of northeastern Galveston, Chambers, southeastern Liberty and southeastern Harris Counties through 445 PM CDT... At 402 PM CDT, Doppler radar was tracking strong thunderstorms along a line extending from near Cove to near Gilchrist to 14 miles southeast of High Island. Movement was southwest at 30 mph. HAZARD...Winds in excess of 40 mph. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Locations impacted include... Southeastern Pasadena, northeastern League City, eastern Baytown, Texas City, La Porte, Seabrook, Beach City, Kemah, eastern Clear Lake, southeastern Mont Belvieu, Taylor Lake Village, El Lago, Anahuac, Shoreacres, Old River-Winfree, Clear Lake Shores, Cove, Morgan`s Point, San Leon and High Island. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.00 IN MAX WIND GUST...40 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building.

area.areaDesc: Bolivar Peninsula; Chambers; Coastal Galveston; Coastal Harris; Galveston Island; Southern Liberty
